snippet: Simon Spilak edged Chris Froome, the defending champion, to win the hilly fourth stage of the Tour de Romandie in Switzerland and take the overall lead by one second.
lead_paragraph: Simon Spilak edged Chris Froome, the defending champion, to win the hilly fourth stage of the Tour de Romandie in Switzerland and take the overall lead by one second.

headline.main: Froome Loses Lead in Tour de Romandie
